articles.description: Liverpool enjoyed significant success on and off the pitch under FSG and that has seen them move ahead of rivals in valuation
articles.content:
Liverpool have moved ahead of some of their biggest rivals in Europe as figures show the clubs value has soared.
 The 2018/19 season saw the Reds lift the Champions League trophy for the sixth time … [+2055 chars]

articles.author: Joseph Chapman
articles.title: Explained: Birmingham City midfielder declines training amid coronavirus concerns - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Bowyer, a former Blues midfielder himself, hopes that Davis will make his return sooner rather than later
articles.content:
Charlton Athletic boss Lee Bowyer is hoping that David Davis can be persuaded into returning to full training after the on loan midfielder declined the invitation of group training this week.
